QuestData.Title: Relics of the Sun King
QuestData.Description: The Seal of the Sun King serves as a defense mechanism for Ramkahen.$B$BWhen the barrier around Uldum fell, we began to see Wastewander outriders from Tanaris filter into our borders.$B$BThey attacked this holy site on their way west and robbed it of the relics which once provided its power.$B$BRecover the relics for us. Without them we are powerless to defend against attacks from the desert.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 4 Relics of the Sun King.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. The rumors I'd heard about you are proving true after all.
